Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Declare War with Normal Casus Belli (6-10[CasusBelli/])
This is listed as an item in the interface
Declare war on the other player using a normal Casus Belli. Your diplomatic state will change to war and your Popular Support will increase.
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
Declare War with Minor Casus Belli (1-5[CasusBelli/])
This is listed as an item in the interface
Declare war on the other player using a minor Casus Belli. Your diplomatic state will change to war and your Popular Support will increase.
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
Declare War with Major Casus Belli (11+[CasusBelli/])
This is listed as an item in the interface
Declare war on the other player using a major Casus Belli. Your diplomatic state will change to war and your Popular Support will increase.
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
This is listed as an item in the interface
Declare war on the other player. This will change your relationship state to war and you will suffer a Population Support penalty.
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
This is listed as an item in the interface
Offer a non-aggression pact in which both player retain a peaceful state.
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
This is listed as an item in the interface
Offer a truce in which both players agree to cease all hostile action.
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
This is listed as an item in the interface

Become vassal of the other player. This effectively creates a fixed alliance with the other player which only the overlord can break. The deal only works if neither player is already a vassal. The overlord will gain an additional {INT_energy}% energy and {INT_research}% research per turn based on the income of their vassal.
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
This is listed as an item in the interface

Become overlord over the other player. This effectively creates a fixed alliance with the other player which only the overlord can break. The deal only works if neither player is already a vassal. The overlord will gain an additional {INT_energy}% energy and {INT_research}% research per turn based on the income of their vassal.
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
This is listed as an item in the interface
Offer a defensive pact in which both players try to aid each other in war.
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
This is listed as an item in the interface
Propose an alliance with the other player. This is a mutual action, and both players need to share a defensive pact first.
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
This is listed as an item in the interface
Break your non-aggression pact and revert back to a neutral state. This will incur some opinion and reputation penalties.
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
This is listed as an item in the interface
Break your defensive pact and revert back to a neutral state. This will incur moderate opinion and reputation penalties.
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
This is listed as an item in the interface
Break your alliance and revert back to a neutral state. This will incur heavy opinion and reputation penalties.
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
This is listed as an item in the interface
Open borders to the other player.
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
This is listed as an item in the interface
Open borders to the other player for a fixed duration.
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
This is listed as an item in the interface
Share vision with the other player.
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
This is listed as an item in the interface
Share vision with the other player for a fixed duration.
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
This is listed as an item in the interface
Share an intelligence pact with the other player.
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
This is listed as an item in the interface
Share an intelligence pact with the other player for a fixed duration.
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
This is listed as an item in the interface
Allow the other player to build on claimed sectors.
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
Allow building on claimed sectors for a fixed duration.
This is listed as an item in the interface
Allow building on claimed sectors for a fixed duration.
This is a tooltip for a trade item in the trade interface
The following modifiers are removed:[br/]{STR_modifiers}[br/]Trading these modifiers will remove them from the relation.
I propose we forge an alliance so we may come to each other's aid in the call to war.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
It is time we further our peaceful relations and ally ourselves in a defensive pact.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
We should forge a non-aggression pact.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Let us forget about the past and move into a new future!

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
I surrender my empire to you. Let us forge an alliance and work together with me as your vassal.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Surrender to me and survive as my loyal vassal. Together, the world will be ours.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
This relationship is over. I'll be coming for you!

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
You have wronged me too many times. You are next on my list!

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
You didn't think I would simply forget, did you?

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Your actions cannot be be forgiven. I will have my revenge!

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
This alliance no longer seems favorable to me. This is where we part ways.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
This defensive pact was clearly not a good idea. Remember that I can crush your empire any time I feel like it.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
I need to have more independence. Our pact is over.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Let us open our borders towards each other. This would greatly improve our mobility.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Let us share our vision so we can better assist each other!

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Sharing our intel will provide us with mutual protection!

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Let's fortify our positions. Allowing me to build near your borders will make us both stronger.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
